text: Otfried Preußler or Otfried Preussler (October 20, 1923 - February 18, 2013) was a German children's book author. He wrote over 100 books. Some of them are The Robber Hotzenplotz and The Satanic Mill (Krabat). His books sold 50 million copies. They have been translated into over 55 languages.Interview with Preußler (in German) Preußler was born on October 20, 1923 in Liberec, Czechoslovakia to German parents. He was married to Annelies Kind from 1949 until his death in 2013. He won the Deutscher Jugendliteraturpreis in 1972 for Krabat. Preußler died on February 18, 2013 in Bavaria, Germany from natural causes, aged 89.Focus Online: Kinderbuchautor Otfried Preußler ist tot ==References== ==Other websites== * Preußler's Official Website * www.worldcat.org: List of Preußler's books that have been translated into English Category:1923 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Writers from Bavaria
